definition: an increase in price or value
details:
noun
- an increase in price or value
= example: an increase in price or value
- a favorable judgment
= synonyms: admiration
- delicate discrimination, especially of aesthetic values
= example: delicate discrimination, especially of aesthetic values
= synonyms: taste, perceptiveness, discernment
- understanding of the nature or meaning or quality or magnitude of something
= synonyms: grasp, hold
- an expression of gratitude
= example: an expression of gratitude
